hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #7# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Dodongo's Cavern is much easier and faster to clear as Adult.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #the Biggoron Sword#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HC (Malon).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Spirit Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Lon Lon Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Map of the Forest Temple# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Fire Temple Compass#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Master, there is a 0 percent chance that this hint is useful in any way.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.
